Types of Discs That Work In the Shrine
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): FAQ (Required Reading!): Types of Discs That Work In the Shrine
By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 1, 2008 - 11:07 am:

Any Music, Playstation, GD-ROM (Dreamcast), or CD-ROM (Computer, any format) will make monsters at the shrine. DVD and CD-I discs do not work if you are playing on a PlayStation (any model) or PS2 (any Model).

DVDs do work if you play the game on a PS3.

Blue-bottomed PS2 discs will work, but the silver-bottomed DVD PS2 discs will not work.

Blank, unformatted CDs will not produce monsters. There are reports of certain brands of formatted CDs producing monsters.
